body:
Hi Nick, 


There was a conflict in the naming of several Radiance executables for Linux distributions.
I use a standard Radiance install of Debian, where genbox is renamed to genrbox:
/usr/bin/genrbox
You also might find "rview" being renamed to "rvu"


Good luck, 


Iebele




  ----- Original Message -----
___
